title: Blended Learning Design and Operational Strategies in the Post-COVID Era

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing blended class design capabilities for workplace-integrated language learning for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more applications of flow experience theory when designing online learning environments.
Learners can incorporate learner motivation strategies based on the Theory of Planned Behavior (TPB) into blended learning activity designs.
Learners can derive and apply correlations between learner attitudes and behavioral intentions to instructional design by analyzing survey results.
Learners can develop blended learning activity scenarios suitable for language education domains in a PBL format.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
